divs: Sighting Detailsme and a friend was watching this night , i have seen many ufo's over the years, and was turning him on too them'' we started at 9.30 pm. the first sighting was at 9.40 pm a very small foo fighter came from out of the tree's & was watching us, this lasted for 2 min's. after this at 10.50pm we had a star like light that moved like a satlight? it came along and just went out? after this at 12.10 am one star like light was in the sky'' it was like it was looking at us'' i told my friend to get ready'' right after this'' it lit up the whole sky '' and it became 25 times bigger!!! it stayed there for 25 sec'' then darted left and died out''
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in French Lick
There were no other sightings in French Lick on or around July 3rd 2008
